Text: Edit: iTunes cannot play the files. Use Windows Media Player or VLC.
Sounds great even though the bitrate is 36. I was shocked.

The sound is ok and there are no pauses at start/end of the files as far as I saw, hear it...
What was the software you used to create this? How can I edit the tags?
The software that I encoded this album with was Pro Audio Converter. As of now it's only for Mac os. I got it on the Mac App store for $10. And yes, you can edit tag metadata with PAC.
